name: Scranton Open Data
description: Empowering Our City with Open Data Welcome to City of Scranton's Geographic Information System (GIS) platform! Discover and explore data and maps regarding local government operations in Scranton. Our mission in providing this data is to encourage the development of creative solutions. In this pursuit we aim to engage, serve, and improve our neighborhoods as well as the quality of life of our residents. We are continuously working to improve government transparency through the publication various datasets.
